actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to limit to $5,000 the amount a Member of Congress may deduct from his income taxes as living expenses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to limit to $5,000 the amount of living expenses which Members of Congress may deduct from their incomes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to limit to $5,000 the amount a Member of Congress may deduct from his income taxes as living expenses.
